_comment: Stress fixture: map iteration order injection. Shuffles JSON object keys before hashing and asserts fingerprint remains identical.
description: Inject shuffled key ordering on inputs and intermediate state. The engine must normalize to sorted keys before hashing.

mutations.description: Inputs with keys in original order

assertion: All trials must produce identical fingerprint. Key order in JSON must not affect hash.
notes: This tests the CanonicalJSON serialization path. Go map iteration is randomized; the engine MUST sort keys before hashing.
